entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
